text: I yesli zhenshchina boitsya ot svoyego muzha surovosti ili ukloneniya, to net grekha na nikh, chtoby oni ustroili mezhdu soboy soglasiye. Ved' soglasiye - luchshe. Pri dushakh postoyanno prebyvayet skupost'. A yesli vy budete blagodetel'ny i bogoboyaznenny, to, poistine, Allakh svedushch v tom, chto vy delayete
